document.full_text: a orthodox jewish rabbi and father of 11 was sentenced to 60 days in prison on thursday for groping his sleeping female seatmate, an israeli soldier, aboard a transatlantic flight.
document.title: israeli rabbi jailed for fondling sleeping woman on plane
lines_and_colors: a orthodox jewish rabbi and father of 11 was sentenced to 60 days in prison on thursday for groping his sleeping female seatmate, an israeli soldier, aboard a transatlantic flight.
